TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DropDownList extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class DropDownList Inherits ListControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 代表允許使用者從下拉式清單選取單一項目的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that allows the user to select a single item from a drop-down list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項來建立單一選取下拉式清單控制項。Use the control to create a single-selection drop-down list control. 您可以控制的外觀藉由設定控制， ，和屬性。You can control the appearance of the control by setting the , , and properties. 若要指定您想要在顯示的項目控制、 放置物件每個項目的開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。To specify the items that you want to appear in the control, place a object for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the control. 控制項也支援資料繫結。The control also supports data binding. 若要將控制項繫結至資料來源，建立資料來源，例如物件，包含要在控制項中顯示的項目。To bind the control to a data source, create a data source, such as a object, that contains the items to display in the control. 然後，使用繫結至資料來源方法控制項。Then, use the method to bind the data source to the control. 使用屬性來以程式設計方式判斷使用者所選取之項目的索引控制項。Use the property to programmatically determine the index of the item selected by the user from the control. 索引可以再用來擷取選取的項目從`Items`控制項的集合。The index can then be used to retrieve the selected item from the `Items` collection of the control. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主題隨附了含有原始程式碼的 Visual Studio Web 站台專案：[下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191893)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=191893). 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立包含四個項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that contains four items. [!code-aspx-csharp[DropDownListDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListDeclarative/CS/dropdownlistdeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DropDownListDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListDeclarative/VB/dropdownlistdeclarativevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立控制透過資料繫結。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control though data binding. [!code-aspx-csharp[DropDownListDataBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListDataBinding/CS/dropdownlistdatabindingcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DropDownListDataBinding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListDataBinding/VB/dropdownlistdatabindingvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的自訂控制項時，使用此成員主要由控制項開發人員類別。This member is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 屬性繼承自類別，並不適用於控制項。The property is inherited from the class and is not applicable to the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得或設定中自訂屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to get or set the property in a custom control. 使用自訂的伺服器控制項的相關資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂的 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For information about using custom server controls, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便一律會傳回的新執行個體類別控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the class for the control. 使用自訂的伺服器控制項的相關資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂的 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For information about using custom server controls, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomDropDownListCreateControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomDropDownListCreateControlCollection/CS/custom_dropdownlist_createcontrolcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomDropDownListCreateControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomDropDownListCreateControlCollection/VB/custom_dropdownlist_createcontrolcollectionvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomDropDownListCreateControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomDropDownListCreateControlCollection/CS/custom_dropdownlist_createcontrolcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomDropDownListCreateControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomDropDownListCreateControlCollection/VB/custom_dropdownlist_createcontrolcollection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual bool LoadPostData (string postDataKey, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection postCollection);

protected: virtual bool LoadPostData(System::String ^ postDataKey, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ postCollection);

param.name: postDataKey
param.span: 張貼集合中的索引，這個索引參考要載入的內容。

span.span: The index within the posted collection that references the content to load.

param.name: postCollection
param.span: 張貼至伺服器之所有內送名稱值的集合。

span.span: The collection of all incoming name values posted to the server.

summary.span: 處理 控制項的回傳資料。

span.span: Processes postback data for the control.

returns.span: 如果 控制項的狀態因為回傳事件而變更，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control's state changes as a result of the postback event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 網頁架構會追蹤所有傳回的伺服器控制項`true`從這個方法呼叫，然後再叫用方法控制項。The ASP.NET page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` from this method call, and then invokes the method on the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void RaisePostDataChangedEvent ();
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostDataChangedEvent() cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub RaisePostDataChangedEvent ()
protected: virtual void RaisePostDataChangedEvent();

summary.span: 在回傳發生時引發 控制項的事件。

span.span: Raises events for the control when postback occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 網頁架構呼叫方法負責控制何時方法表示清單項目的狀態已變更中控制項。The ASP.NET page framework calls the method on a control when the method indicates that the state of the list items has changed in the control. 方法呼叫方法，以引發事件。The method calls the method to raise the event. 控制項開發人員可以覆寫方法來執行自訂處理，當使用者在控制項中選取項目。Control developers can override the method to perform custom processing when the user selects items in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int SelectedIndex { get; set; }
.property instance int32 SelectedIndex
Public Overrides Property SelectedIndex As Integer
public: virtual property int SelectedIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中選取之項目的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the selected item in the control.

value.span: 控制項中選取之項目的索引。

span.span: The index of the selected item in the control.

value.span: 預設值為 0，將選取清單中的第一個項目。

span.span: The default value is 0, which selects the first item in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以程式設計方式指定，或判斷選取的項目，從索引控制項。Use the property to programmatically specify or determine the index of the selected item from the control. 一律會選取一個項目控制項。An item is always selected in the control. 您無法清除選取項目從清單中的每個項目在相同的時間。You cannot clear the selection from every item in the list at the same time. > [!NOTE] > 中的項目索引控制是以零為起始。The indexes for the items in the control are zero-based. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷在選取的項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the selected item in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DropDownListSelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListSelectedIndex/CS/dropdownlistselectedindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DropDownListSelectedIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DropDownListSelectedIndex/VB/dropdownlistselectedindexvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { get; }
.property instance bool SupportsDisabledAttribute
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SupportsDisabledAttribute As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SupportsDisabledAttribute { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性表示的 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0，否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 永遠擲回 例外狀況，因為 控制項不支援多重選取。

span.span: Always throws an exception because multiple selection is not supported for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項不支援多重選取，則會擲回例外狀況。The control does not support multiple selections and throws an exception.

span.span: In all cases.
